entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.5°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning and in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
